category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ItemRevision_thumbnail_references
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list in descending order of priority of reference types for Datasets in an Item Revision, used to determine which Dataset will be used to create a Thumbnail for the Item Revision. The ordered list of Datasets is first obtained through the value of the preference ItemRevision_thumbnail_relations, and then filtered using the values entered for this preference. Valid values are for instance TIF_Reference, JPEG_Reference, etc.
